dublin_core.dcvalue: Sara Chaimberlain Head of Information Communications Technology India at BBC Media Action gave this presentation at the March 12 meeting of the mHealth Working Group This presentation covers challenges and best practices for taking a mHealth community health worker education application to national scale in Bihar India
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T11:03:51Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 march_sara.pdf: 2116238 bytes, checksum: 0f2182b92400fcbde3e8d9938069e3f7 (MD5)
Scaling the Ananya Program in Bihar, India: Challenges and Best Practices
